about_the_game:
This A-Spec First Assault demo allows players to experience first/third-person tactical space combat in corvette-sized starships, each with automated turrets, gimballed guns, and Newtonian forces to overcome and master. Play against the AI in a team battle with 3 starships per side to choose from, customize starship load-outs, and give orders to your wingmates.

The demo includes:
  • The prologue campaign with seven story based missions acting as both tutorial and introduction to the game universe
  • Skirmish: choose and outfit ships for your computer team mates and opponent in Team Vs Team skirmishes



Keep your enemy against your strongest side while you attack their weakest.
All warships use a quadrant-based damage model for 8 sides to protect or take advantage against. Ship positioning will matter.

Familiar present-day weaponry
The majority of weaponry available will be familiar to present-day and mountable on turrets with limited firing arcs.

Warship Customization
Customize your ship's weaponry with a range of projectile and missile turrets. Turrets slots have a maximum supported size and fitting the biggest guns in each slot is not an option. Then enhance the abilities of your warship by fitting modules, impacting offensive and defensive ship systems to gain an early advantage over your foes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: CPU: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX12 capable GPUs.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device

short_description: Engaging space combat simulator, using a realistic 6DoF flight system with Newtonian physics, tuned for fun, sophisticated and diverse gameplay featuring detailed ship systems, including ship weaponry and module customization.
